text:
https://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-8.0-doc/changelog.html
source code: webapps/docs/changelog.xml

Fix:  56777: Allow file based configuration resources (user database, certificate revocation lists, keystores an dtrust stores) to be configured using URLs as well as files. (markt)

"keystores an dtrust stores" should be "keystores and trust stores"
creator: huxing.zhang@gmail.com
